nodes.file_name: 2. 제품 페이지 본문에 게시될 피트니스 - 운동 프로그램 선택 이미지.png
3. 제품 페이지 본문에 게시될 헬스스톤 이미지.png

nodes.long_description:
🌟 귀엽고 중독적인 피트니스.⠀

매일 접속하고 싶은 운동 모험이 시작돼요.  ⠀

지루하게만 느껴졌던 운동,  ⠀

이제는 즐겁게 떠나는 여정으로 바꿔보세요.⠀

 ⠀

🎯 게임처럼 즐기는 운동⠀

달리고, 미션을 깨고, 헬스 스톤을 모으고!⠀

어느새 땀 흘리고 있는 나를 발견하게 될 거예요.⠀

 ⠀

🐾 티온프렌즈와 함께하는 성장 여정⠀

혼자 하는 운동, 벌써 지치셨죠?

귀엽고 든든한 티온프렌즈와 함께라면

매일의 운동도 레벨업처럼 즐겁게!⠀

 ⠀

🌅 감성을 더한 명상 콘텐츠⠀

모닥불 앞에서, 잔잔한 바다를 보며,

혹은 반딧불이 가득한 숲 속에서 즐기는⠀

명상과 스트레칭⠀

 ⠀

📱 앱으로 더 완벽하게

홈트 콘텐츠, 스케줄 관리, 운동 결과까지  ⠀

T-ON 앱으로 피트니스 여정을 이어갈 수 있어요.⠀

 ⠀
 ⠀


📌 주요 특징⠀

곤란한 프렌즈들 도와주기⠀

프렌즈들과 운동 대결하기 ⠀

지역마다 숨어 있는 헬스스톤 수집 ⠀

키키의 코칭에 따라 맞춤 운동 ⠀

운동 후 명상과 스트레칭⠀

 ⠀
 ⠀


📱티온 앱 다운로드 

[검색 키워드 : 티온케어]


(Google) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.hmit.tioncare


(iOS) https://apps.apple.com/kr/app/티온케어/id6443477483

 ⠀
 ⠀


👇 지금 바로 디스코드에서 함께해요⠀

https://discord.com/invite/as8yVmjJcC⠀



{9576691409117451}

nodes.long_description:
🌟 かわいくて中毒性のあるフィットネス

毎日ログインしたくなるフィットネスアドベンチャーが始まります。

退屈だった運動が、楽しい旅に変わります！

 ⠀



🎯 ゲーム感覚で楽しめる運動

走って、ミッションをクリアして、Health Stoneを集めよう！

 ⠀



🐾 T-ON Friendsと一緒に成長の旅へ

ひとりでの運動、もう飽きてきましたよね？

かわいくて心強いT-ON Friendsと一緒なら、

毎日のトレーニングもレベルアップのように楽しくなります！

 ⠀



🌅 癒しの感性をプラスした瞑想コンテンツ

焚き火の前で、穏やかな海を眺めながら、

ホタルの舞う森の中で楽しむストレッチや瞑想。

心も体もリラックス。

 ⠀



📱 アプリでさらに完璧に

ホームトレーニングコンテンツ、スケジュール管理、運動結果の確認まで、

T-ONアプリであなたのフィットネス旅をサポートします。

 ⠀



📌 主な特徴

困っているFriendsを助けよう

Friendsとフィットネスバトル！

各地域に隠されたHealth Stoneを収集

KIKIのコーチングによるパーソナルトレーニング

運動後は瞑想とストレッチでリフレッシュ

 ⠀


 📱Join us on T-ON APP now!

[Keyword : t-on care / t-oncare]



(Google) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.hmit.tioncare


(iOS) https://apps.apple.com/jp/app/t-on/id6443477483
{1382139872849849}


👇 Join us on Discord now!

https://discord.com/invite/as8yVmjJcC

nodes.long_description:
🌟 Adorably Addictive Fitness

Your daily adventure in fitness starts now.

Tired of boring workouts?

It’s time to turn them into a fun and exciting journey!

 ⠀


🎯 Work Out Like a Game

Run, complete missions, and collect Health Stones!

Before you know it, you’ll be sweating and smiling.⠀


🐾 Grow Together with T-ON Friends

Exercising alone can feel exhausting, right?

With your cute and reliable T-ON Friends,

every workout feels like leveling up!

 ⠀


🌅 Mindful Moments, Emotional Touch

Stretch and meditate by a campfire,

by the calm sea, or deep in a firefly-filled forest.

Breathe in peace, breathe out stress.

 ⠀


📱 The App Makes It All Complete

From home workout content to schedule tracking and fitness results,

continue your fitness journey with the T-ON app.


 ⠀



📌 Key Features

Help out your troubled Friends

Compete in fitness challenges with Friends


Collect hidden Health Stones in each region

Personalized workouts guided by KIKI

Relax and recover with meditation and stretching sessions after exercise

 ⠀


 📱Join us on T-ON APP now! 

[Keyword : t-on care / t-oncare]


(Google) https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=kr.hmit.tioncare 


(iOS) https://apps.apple.com/us/app/t-on/id6443477483

{651512490834499}

 ⠀

👇 Join us on Discord now!

https://discord.com/invite/as8yVmjJcC
nodes.short_description:
🌟 Adorably Addictive Fitness
Your daily adventure in fitness starts now.

nodes.long_description:
▪ Adventure with T-ON Care
Your avatar syncs with you to exercise together.
Enjoy activity modes focused on running and turn-based stage modes according to the main scenario.

▪ Personalized Intensive Workout
Fitness
Fitness provides customized exercises by analyzing user exercise data collected through the avatar's personal training in the intensive workout mode.

▪ Healing Your Day
Meditation
Meditation offers visualized meditations that enhance relaxation and restfulness of the body after exercise.

▪ 15 Expert-Researched Exercise Movements
The 15 exercise movements included in the content are designed based on expert research.

▪ Say Goodbye to Boring Workouts,
Fun for Everyone, Young and Old
From T-ON Friends' dialogues to movement guides, rich BGM, and narration add to the fun of exercising.
nodes.short_description:
Experience Unique Healthcare at T-ON Fitness
Try T-ON Fitness's Personalized Workout Programs

Explore T-ON Fitness for a unique healthcare experience with our customized exercise programs designed just for you.

More Realistic and Immersive in VR
Active Life is T-ON Anytime, Anywhere

Experience a more realistic and immersive workout with T-ON in VR. With Active Life, T-ON is available to you anytime and anywhere.

Say Goodbye to Boring Workouts,
Fun for Everyone, Young and Old
